name: NumberLink Dots& Unblock Block
description:
Number Link is a simple but addictive puzzle game.

Connect matching colors with pipe, pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But be careful, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Content
- Over 2,000 free levels available in Free Play mode
- 10 different board sizes: 5*5,6*6,7*7,8*8,9*9,10*10,11*11,12*12,13*14,14*14
- Hints in case you get stuck
- Smooth, polished touch interaction
- Colorful UI
- Fun sound effects

Unblock is a simple and addictive challenged puzzle game. The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way, unblock it with the minimal moves. Unblock comes with 4 modes from Easy to Expert. There are over 10000 puzzles in total.
